ARABIC: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when We revealed to your mother:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When We told your mother what We relate:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall, when We indicated to your mother through inspiration:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Remember when We inspired your mother with a certain inspiration
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “When We inspired in your mother’s heart whatever was to be inspired.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When We inspired your mother with that which We inspired."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When We revealed to your mother what was revealed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when We revealed what was revealed unto thy mother:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When we inspired in thy mother that which is inspired,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when We revealed Our will to your mother, saying,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When We inspired unto thy mother that which We inspired,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when We revealed to your mother whatever was to be revealed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! We sent to thy mother, by inspiration, the message:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When We inspired your mother with that which We inspired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when We revealed what was to be made known to your mother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When We inspired your mother with the inspiration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:38] when (idh, for explanation [of that favour]) We revealed to your mother, either in [her] sleep or by way of inspiration — when she gave birth to you and feared that Pharaoh would have you slain for being one of the newborn [of the Children of Israel] — that which was revealed, regarding your affair (this [mā yūhā, ‘that which was revealed’] is substituted by [what follows, an iqdhifīhi …]),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When We inspired in thy mother that which is inspired,
